segments.text: I observe an indoor kitchen scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's an adult woman and two children present.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My eye is immediately drawn to the sink area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is gushing from the faucet and overflowing the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring over the front edge in a continuous sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water forms a widening puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands right in front of it, drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely unaware of the torrent at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already submerged in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed this significant mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is utterly neutral, fixed on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer obliviousness is quite striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long this has been going on.
segments.speaker: PAR
